articles.title: Skoda Kushaq Monte Carlo Edition In The Works - CarDekho
articles.description: The Monte Carlo badge has meant many things for different Skoda cars but what could it do for the Kushaq?     Kushaq will be launched in June, 2021 with deliveries set to begin a month after.    In India, Rapid gets a Monte Carlo version with visual updates a…
articles.content:
• Kushaq will be launched in June, 2021 with deliveries set to begin a month after.
  • In India, Rapid gets a Monte Carlo version with visual updates at a premium of Rs 30,000.
